description: Number of elements in the continued fraction for sum(k=0..n,1/2^2^k).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-2).
prog: (Sage) [floor(gaussian_binomial(n,1,2)+3) for n in xrange(-1,32)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 31 2009](MAGMA) [Floor(2^(n-1)+2): n in [0..60]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Sep 21 2011
crossrefs: Cf. A007400. Apart from initial term, same as A052548. See also A089985.
author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 07 2002
